item.title: MIUI V12.0.4.0.QJETWXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 9T Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9T Taiwan

Codename: cannong

Version: V12.0.4.0.QJETWXM | 10.0

MD5: 778f7c7899142300af096fcb59be400d

[Cleaner]
